channel.title: HumidityX 667/711 Development
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2dabw52.png[/img]
[B]HumidityX 711[/B] New Armour Looks/Bosses/Kill-Death/Titles/Minigames/Shops/Events
[B]About HumidityX[/B] -Economy Based -Better trade -Gpi -Shops -Re written skills -Dominion tower -Equipment stats fixes -Prices -Bonuses -Packed npc's & shops -Cache -Re written combat -Item wielding fixes -Item bonus on equipment stats fix -Global objects & Npchandling & spawning -New teleportations -New exp rates -Fixed dupes -Fixed exp rates -New skills -Summoning scrolls perfected -Auras (Activating, Deactivating, Recharging) -New tutorial -200+ players registered -Dedicated server -Bosses -Friendly Staff -Lunars/Ancients/Moderns -Curses (With Quick Prayers) -All Weapon Special Attacks -Now Loading 711 -TokHar-Khal Cape -New Armours -Vps
[B]PvP/Pking:[/B] - We have a perfected Pvp system. - We also have a lot of pkers who are into Hybridding, a well-known and fun type of pking. - Switching is near perfect (99% RS Speeds) - Storm of Armadyl, New boots, and more. - Armours such as Torva, Barrows, and PvP Armour Degrade when in use and when they are dropped in PvP.
[B]PvM:[/B] - King Black Dragon with all attacks and effects - Tormented Demons with all 3 switches - Full Nex with all 4 stages (Flawless) - Close to 100% Godwars (Missing Armadyl and Zamorak will have up soon) - Corporeal beast with Impact hits and all correct attacks - Frost dragons - Dominion Tower - Barrows
[B]PvP And PvM:[/B] - Near Perfect combat, 99.9% flawless - Full Summoning!! - Armour set effects all added! - Degrading Pvp Armours - Storm Of Armadyl Spell - Flawless Prayer system (Normal/Ancient Prayers)
[B]Miscellaneous:[/B] - All special attacks working properly for Most Weapons! - Quick Chat 100% - Flawless Music & Sound system - Perfect XP counter - Equipment Stats Fix - Gpi Fix - Item On Item - NpcHandling - NpcSpawning - Configurations - Implements
Forums: [url=http://humidityx.site50.net/]http://humidityx.site50.net/[/url] Webclient: [url=http://www.humidityx.smfnew.com/index.php?page=page4813]http://www.humidityx.smfnew.com/index.php?page=page4813[/url] Client: [url=http://dl.dropbox.com/u/56253021/HumidityX.jar]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/56253021/HumidityX.jar[/url] Youtube: [url=http://www.youtube.com/iftithebeast]www.youtube.com/iftithebeast[/url] Jre: [url=http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/jre-7u3-download-1501631.html]http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/jre-7u3-download-1501631.html[/url]
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/2cqha8h.png[/img] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/25g6ixt.png[/img] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/2ebyf54.png[/img] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/34qw9y0.png[/img] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/b8uzjt.png[/img] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/34rzrb4.png[/img] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/jutpgn.png[/img]

item.title: HumidityX 667/711 Development
item.dc:creator: @Humid Humid
item.description:
@Humid wrote:

HumidityX 711
New Armour Looks/Bosses/Kill-Death/Titles/Minigames/Shops/Events

About HumidityX
-Economy Based
-Better trade
-Gpi
-Shops
-Re written skills
-Dominion tower
-Equipment stats fixes
-Prices
-Bonuses
-Packed npc’s & shops
-Cache
-Re written combat
-Item wielding fixes
-Item bonus on equipment stats fix
-Global objects & Npchandling & spawning
-New teleportations
-New exp rates
-Fixed dupes
-Fixed exp rates
-New skills
-Summoning scrolls perfected
-Auras (Activating, Deactivating, Recharging)
-New tutorial
-200+ players registered
-Dedicated server
-Bosses
-Friendly Staff
-Lunars/Ancients/Moderns
-Curses (With Quick Prayers)
-All Weapon Special Attacks
-Now Loading 711
-TokHar-Khal Cape
-New Armours
-Vps

PvP/Pking:

  • We have a perfected Pvp system.
  • We also have a lot of pkers who are into Hybridding, a well-known and fun type of pking.
  • Switching is near perfect (99% RS Speeds)
  • Storm of Armadyl, New boots, and more.
  • Armours such as Torva, Barrows, and PvP Armour Degrade when in use and when they are dropped in PvP.

PvM:

  • King Black Dragon with all attacks and effects
  • Tormented Demons with all 3 switches
  • Full Nex with all 4 stages (Flawless)
  • Close to 100% Godwars (Missing Armadyl and Zamorak will have up soon)
  • Corporeal beast with Impact hits and all correct attacks
  • Frost dragons
  • Dominion Tower
  • Barrows

PvP And PvM:

  • Near Perfect combat, 99.9% flawless
  • Full Summoning!!
  • Armour set effects all added!
  • Degrading Pvp Armours
  • Storm Of Armadyl Spell
  • Flawless Prayer system (Normal/Ancient Prayers)

Miscellaneous:

  • All special attacks working properly for Most Weapons!
  • Quick Chat 100%
  • Flawless Music & Sound system
  • Perfect XP counter
  • Equipment Stats Fix
  • Gpi Fix
  • Item On Item
  • NpcHandling
  • NpcSpawning
  • Configurations
  • Implements
